member.name: M:Nito.AsyncEx.EnlightenmentVerification.EnsureLoaded
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the correct platform enlightenment provider has been loaded.

member.name: T:Nito.AsyncEx.Internal.PlatformEnlightenment.EnlightenmentProvider.SynchronizationContextEnlightenment
member.summary: This enlightenment will work on all platforms (net4/win8/sl4/wp75). However, it is not supported in portable libraries for: net40/sl5/wp70/wp71.

member.name: T:Nito.AsyncEx.Internal.PlatformEnlightenment.EnlightenmentProvider.ThreadPoolEnlightenment
member.summary: This enlightenment will work on most platforms (net4/sl4/wp75). However, it is not supported in portable libraries.
